name: Block Match!
description:
Use the left and right arrow keys to steer your pieces, and the up arrow to rotate.

Don't let the pieces stack up too high, or you won't be able to move and your game will be over.

Source code to be released soon

Enjoy!

Thanks and Credits

  • Font used from Kenny Fonts - https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
  • Button Sfx from Eric Matyas used from - https://soundimage.org/sfx-ui/
  • BGM from Eric Matyas - http://soundimage.org/chiptunes/its-raining-pixels/
